actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, so as to exempt subsistence allowances of law enforcement officers of the United States from Federal income taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income statutory subsistence allowances received by police officers after 1969.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, so as to exempt subsistence allowances of law enforcement officers of the United States from Federal income taxes.
